TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpServerUtilityBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 作為提供 Helper 方法以處理 Web 要求之類別的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that provide helper methods for processing Web requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別，其中包含相同的成員類別。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 類別可讓您建立衍生的類別，它就像是類別，但您可以自訂，而且 ASP.NET 管線外運作。The class enables you to create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 當您執行單元測試時，通常會使用衍生的類別來實作自訂行為符合您要測試的案例使用的成員。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing. 類別衍生自 類別。The class derives from the class. 類別可做為包裝函式類別。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在執行階段，因此您通常使用的執行個體類別來呼叫的成員物件。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to call members of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: protected HttpServerUtilityBase ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: HttpServerUtilityBase();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，在目前處理序的內容中，執行指定虛擬路徑的處理常式，並使用 執行個體從執行的處理常式中擷取輸出。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, executes the handler for the specified virtual path in the context of the current process, using a instance to capture output from the executed handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `writer`參數由參考傳遞至方法。The `writer` parameter is passed by reference to the method. 若要在方法完成之後，請從處理常式擷取輸出，您使用的屬性和方法`writer`物件。To retrieve the output from the handler after the method completes, you use the properties and methods of the `writer` object. 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

span.span: Always.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用指定的 HTTP 方法和標頭，以非同步方式在指定的 URL 執行端點。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, asynchronously executes the endpoint at the specified URL by using the specified HTTP method and headers.
Always.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，使用指定的 HTTP 方法、標頭、路徑，以及保留表單值和保留使用者識別的選項，以非同步方式執行位於指定的 URL 上的結束點。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, asynchronously executes the end point at the specified URL, using the specified HTTP method, headers, path, and options to preserve form values and preserve the user identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `output`參數由參考傳遞至方法。The `output` parameter is passed by reference to the method. 若要在方法完成之後，請從處理常式擷取輸出，您使用的屬性和方法`output`物件。To retrieve the output from the handler after the method completes, you use the properties and methods of the `output` object. 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用 base64 數字，將位元組陣列編碼成對等的字串表示，使其可在 URL 上傳輸。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, encodes a byte array into an equivalent string representation by using base64 digits, which makes it usable for transmission on the URL.

returns.span: 如果 的長度大於 1，則為包含已編碼陣列的字串，否則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The string that contains the encoded array if the length of is greater than 1; otherwise, an empty string ("")
Always.
